<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><Highlight kind="comment">/// If U is widenable branch looking like:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %cond = ...</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %wc = call i1 @llvm.experimental.widenable.condition()</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %branch&#95;cond = and i1 %cond, %wc</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><Highlight kind="comment">///   br i1 %branch&#95;cond, label %if&#95;true&#95;bb, label %if&#95;false&#95;bb ; &lt;--- U</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The function returns true, and the values %cond and %wc and blocks</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><Highlight kind="comment">/// %if&#95;true&#95;bb, if&#95;false&#95;bb are returned in</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the parameters (Condition, WidenableCondition, IfTrueBB and IfFalseFF)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><Highlight kind="comment">/// respectively. If \\p U does not match this pattern, return false.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a745200db7bc2a7a3c17fa379fb1b56c3">parseWidenableBranch</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user">User</a> &#42;U, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;&amp;Condition,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><Highlight kind="normal">                          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;&amp;WidenableCondition, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;&amp;IfTrueBB,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><Highlight kind="normal">                          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;&amp;IfFalseBB);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Analogous to the above, but return the Uses so that they can be</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The guard condition is expected to be in form of:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   cond1 &amp;&amp; cond2 &amp;&amp; cond3 ...</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// or in case of widenable branch:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
